customer_name: Mc Callums Orchard & Cider Mill L L C
site_name: MC CALLUMS ORCHARD & CIDER MILL L L C
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This 1st pre-license inspection for a Class (cid:28)C(cid:29) license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
Submit the appropriate license fee to the Eastern Regional Office. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act
 
 
Exit interview conducted with the licensee and APHIS representative Kurt Hammel.
